name: WeirdLand
description:
WeirdLand is a WIP arcade shooting game, heavily inspired by Moorhuhn. Visually, I've tried to recreate aestetics of NES/SNES-inspired flash/XBLA games (hopefully it was somewhat successful).

Gameplay-wise its in alpha stage - core is there, but some things (such as enemy spawns) should be adjusted (and thats why survival mode is unavailable right now).

As for right now, this project is on hold - I would like to come back, rewrite it from python to C++ and finish everything content-related... just not today.

Controls:

A/D to move the camera.

R to reload.

P to pause.

LMB to do pew-pew.

Special Thanks:

- kotobank gang for testing my garbage and cheering me up.
